checks.name: MySQL Replication SQL Running
args: /usr/bin/mysql -e 'SHOW SLAVE STATUS\G' | grep -w Slave_SQL_Running | awk '{ print $1$2; if ($2 == "Yes") { exit 0 } else { exit 1}}'

checks.name: MySQL Replication Lag
args: /usr/bin/mysql -e 'SHOW SLAVE STATUS\G' | grep -w Seconds_Behind_Master | awk '{ print $1$2; if ($2 == 0) { exit 0 } else { exit 1}}'
